short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download and save TikTok videos easily with 'TikTok Downloader Pro'. Quick, watermark-free, high-quality clips at one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download TikTok videos quickly and easily with 'TikTok Downloader Pro'! This convenient extension allows you to save your favorite clips without watermarks and in high quality. Simply browse TikTok as usual, and with one click, download the videos you want to keep. It's a perfect solution for creating video collections, making montages, or just for offline viewing!

How does it work?:
1. Open a TikTok video in your browser.
2. Click on the extension button in your browser.
3. Click the "download" button on the website
